title: The Paradise Room
description:
Much loved author Belinda Jones has written another delightful and deliciously funny rom-com, guaranteed to brighten your day. Perfect for fans of 

Jo Thomas, Lindsey Kelk, Sophie Kinsella and Paige Toon.
'You won't want to put this feel-good read down' -- Company Magazine'A sparkling, addictive read' -- NewWoman'Such a feel-good book' -- ***** Reader review'A book to read again and again' -- ***** Reader review'Enjoyed it from start to finish' -- ***** Reader review'I was thoroughly hooked!' -- ***** Reader review'This is Belinda at her best' -- ***** Reader review*********************************************************************************************A WHOLE NEW WORLD AWAITS...BUT IS SHE READY TO DIVE IN?When Amber Pepper's boyfriend Hugh asks her to join him on a business trip to the paradise islands of Tahiti she's not keen - she's more of a woolly jumper and rain girl. However, the prospect of sipping Mai Tais on the beach with her long-lost childhood friend Felicity, also bound for Tahiti, is incentive enough to coax her on the twenty-hour flight.Within hours of touching down on coral sands, the girls venture into a seductive new world of mesmerising music and exotic, sexy strangers. And for the first time Amber falls head over flip-flops in lust, only to receive an unexpected marriage proposal.Will she opt for a barefoot beach wedding or cast caution - and her coconut bra - to the wind?No easy decision for a drizzle-loving gal when it's ninety degrees in the shade...
author: Belinda Jones
